resource: 1003136.description=Brake system warning buzzer:When there is a possible problem that could affect braking performance, the warning light will come on and a warning buzzer will sound. 1003136.vtc=true 1003136.1002622.description=Brake system warning buzzer:When there is a possible problem that could affect braking performance, the warning light will come on and a warning buzzer will sound. 1003136.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
